EmailTemplate.name: Quote Approval Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote(s) Submitted for Sales Review - Employer Name: {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Your Quote {!Proposal__c.Name} and attachements for {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c}, {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} have generated. Please review.
Thank you.
